title: Person of Interest 5x04 Promo "6,741" (HD)
author: televisionpromosdb
comment: "Everyone thinks she's dead." Uhhh no we don't loll

it's incredibly hilarious to begin this trailer with "everyone thought she was dead" when the show has made it clear over and over again that shaw is alive, despite what finch implied. besides, the writers and creators have said since 4.11 aired, since sarah left, that she's very welcome to return as shaw is not dead. like no 2 episodes after shaw got shot they confirmed on the show that she's alive. no 4-5 episodes ago we last got to see that she's alive this is hilarious idk im laughing
i can't wait to see Root's face when she sees shaw again.
SHAW'S BACK!!!!! Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes!!!!! I DEMAND a sneak peek!
Shaw will always be special! thank you Sarah Shahi!!
description:
Person of Interest 5x04 "6,741" - Shaw escapes her captors, but the team is unsure of her mental state when she begins to act paranoid and reckless, on PERSON OF INTEREST, Monday, May 16th on CBS. Subscribe  for more Person of Interest season 5 promos and sneak peeks in HD!
